channel.title: Need help changing server ip in client
channel.description:
Can anybody tell me how I set up mennos client so that it uses the hamachi ip i was given? Mennos client does not have a place to type in a server ip, so when other people try to log on, it says error connecting to server.
Thanks,

item.title: Need help changing server ip in client
item.dc:creator: @easternbikes easternbikes
item.description:
@easternbikes wrote:

Thanks man I’ll try it out,

Read full topic
item.source: Need help changing server ip in client

item.title: Need help changing server ip in client
item.dc:creator: @th3_w01f th3 w01f
item.description:
@th3_w01f wrote:

It’s the graphic’s that it run’s. for example, original rs2 is 317, newer graphic’s is a 508, and 525 is graphic’s with up-to-date item’s such as d claw’s that arnt customly added in to the server. and to find your ip you could look for a GUI.java file or you can used a z-file sercher to find out where it is.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 04, 2009, 03:18:05 pm[/size][hr][quote=“easternbikes, post:1, topic:306354”]Can anybody tell me how I set up mennos client so that it uses the hamachi ip i was given? Mennos client does not have a place to type in a server ip, so when other people try to log on, it says error connecting to server.

Thanks,[/quote]

Oh, menno’s. i had them once and got confused aswell. If i remember right there like a 377 server? I wish i could be more help but all i remember is that I also had trouble. Check the applet_sub and see if you get any result’s. best of luck!

Read full topic
